name: Automobilista
notes:
Force Feedback in Logitech Wheels don't work if you don't use "new-lg4ff" ( https://github.com/berarma/new-lg4ff )
If you use WinXP in Wineconf the game give an error at Start
If you use versions later than Wine 4.13, a lot of tracks and cars are not shown in menu.
content:
game:
  appid: 431600
installer:
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows 7 mode for Wine
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: fps
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
